shortcuts.name: Find Gas Stations
shortcuts.shortDescription: Find Gas Stations in 1 mile radius
shortcuts.longDescription: The shortcut will give you a list of gas stations in a 1 mile radius
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions

shortcuts.name: Water Eject
shortcuts.longDescription: The shortcut will play a high frequency sound to eject water from the device
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions

shortcuts.name: Where was the photo taken
shortcuts.longDescription: Gives you the location and other information about a photo
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions

shortcuts.name: Resize Video
shortcuts.longDescription: Resize a video to a target size
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions

shortcuts.name: Save Twitter
shortcuts.longDescription: Save video from Twitter using the sharesheet option
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions

shortcuts.name: Emoji to Image
shortcuts.longDescription: Enter an emoji and convert it into an image
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions

shortcuts.name: Text Last Image
shortcuts.longDescription: Share the last image in your photos through message
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions

shortcuts.name: Paste and Translate
shortcuts.longDescription: Translate the text that you have copied from your clipboard
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions

shortcuts.name: Multiple Alarms
shortcuts.longDescription: Set multiple alarms at different intervals
shortcuts.notes: Add it and then allow permissions
